name: training-diary
description: An application for keeping a diary of trainings, planning exercises, analyzing nutrition and progress.

scripts.pug_tmpl: pug --client blocks/exerciseInfo/exerciseInfo.pug --extension pug.js --name exerciseInfo_tmpl && pug --client blocks/exerciseAddForm/exerciseAddForm.pug --extension pug.js --name exerciseAddForm_tmpl

author: bruzhmelev@gmail.com
